channel.title: self care on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in self care on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Self care must come first (usually)
item.description: In relationships where everyone is equally able to take care of themselves, you need to take care of yourself first. In general, you are the only person who truly knows what you need, and everyone else is too busy taking care of themselves to take care of you. (And to be clear, I am speaking to you, dear reader, not just the generalized “you” which really means “I”.) Today I learned the value of taking care of myself as related to my (online) men’s group.
